name: Fluff it Out
description:
Welcome to life when children leave their room. Plush toys come to life and fight to the death to win. In this game you and your friends can select a plush toy to play as and you fight in a split screen combat arena in a child's room until one of you wins.

This game can only be controlled using a controller and the control scheme can be found in screenshots or in game menus.

This game was created as a student group project for a university module.
